Uses of Class
projectpokemon.logic.Trainer

    • Uses of Trainer in projectpokemon.logic

      Methods in projectpokemon.logic that return Trainer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Trainer InfoBattleAI.getCurrentOpponent()
      Returns the current opponent trainer
      Trainer Battle.getPlayer1()
      Returns the Trainer considered to be Player 1.
      Trainer Battle.getPlayer2()
      Returns the Trainer considered to be Player 2.
      Methods in projectpokemon.logic with parameters of type Trainer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int Battle.attackPokemon(Pokemon attacker, Pokemon defender, int movIndex, Trainer who)
      Sets the BattleVariables depending on if the move hits, is critical or not, its effectiveness on the foe and the StatStages it may apply to both the attacking and defending pokemon.
      void Battle.setCritical(boolean critical, Trainer who)
      Sets the Critical attributes in the BattleVariables according to if the given Trainer's pokemon critically struck the foe.
      void Battle.setEffectiveness(Move move, Pokemon target, Trainer who)
      Sets the Effectiveness attributes in the BattleVariables according to the effectiveness of the move used by the given Trainer's pokemon on the foe.
      void Battle.setMove(int moveIndex, Trainer who)
      Sets the corresponding moveIndex attribute in the BattleVariables to the one passed as a parameter according to the given trainer.
      boolean Battle.setMoveHit(boolean moveHit, Trainer who)
      Sets the Hits attributes in the BattleVariables according to if the given Trainer's pokemon has successfully hit the foe.
      void Battle.setPlayer1(Trainer player1)
      Sets player1 to the given Trainer
      void Battle.setPlayer2(Trainer player2)
      Sets player2 to the given Trainer
      void Battle.setStages(StatStages self, StatStages enemy, Trainer who)
      Sets both player's stages attribute in the BattleVariables according to the given Trainer.
      void Battle.setSwitch(boolean switched, Trainer who)
      Sets the Switch attributes in the BattleVariables according to if the given Trainer has switched pokemons.
      void Battle.switchPokemon(int index, Trainer who)
      Swaps the pokemon at the given index with the one at the first position of the party (the party leader).
      Constructors in projectpokemon.logic with parameters of type Trainer 
      Constructor and Description
      Battle(Trainer player1, Trainer player2)
      Constructor of Battle.
      BattleAI(Trainer player1, Trainer player2)
      Constructor of Battle.
